name: Adetiq Ltd
tagline: UK's Leading Business Process Outsourcing Company
description:
Adetiq are experts in document and data processing and are rated ‘Best Value Service Provider’ by the Global Sourcing Association. 
We take complex business and back office processes, re-engineer them using our production environment adding bespoke AI and robotics along with the tightest security to deliver documents and data back to our clients that drives their business performance.
We drive down cost and free up client resource by breaking down and mapping the end to end process to push knowledge-based tasks to people and repetitive tasks to automation. It can be anything from extracting critical data from legal documents reducing time to litigation, to designing Healthcare questionnaires and capturing the results that support the improvement of operating waiting times or creating and maintaining the largest sports club database in the UK for Sport England. 
We have clever programmers, the best most efficient data capture and scanning operation and very smart consultants. We’ve been going for more than 50 years and are based wholly in the UK so we have expertise that no one else can match - hence the Best Value Provider award.
SMART PEOPLE. SMART TECH. SMART OUTCOMES.
